mapper.select: select t.id, t.`title`, t.`status`, t.`created`, t.`edited`, t.`owner`, t.`matrix` from task t where t.`owner`=#{owner} order by t.`edited` desc
mapper.insert: insert into task (title, status, created, edited, owner, matrix) values (#{title}, 1, now(), now(), #{owner}, 2)
mapper.update: update task set status=0 where id=#{id}
update task set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
